payload.title: Update validator_module.md - 7/7 Records Complete
payload.description: Update validator_module.md blueprint to reflect complete implementation of all 7 record types. Update capability tables, EARS traceability matrix, implementation metrics and cross-references to include ExecutionRecord, ChangelogRecord, FeedbackRecord validators.
payload.notes: Updated validator_module.md with complete 7/7 record type implementation. Added metrics section showing 75 validation tests, 21 validators implemented, 0 TypeScript errors. Updated capability tables and EARS traceability for ExecutionRecord, ChangelogRecord, FeedbackRecord.
